abstract: Asbury Park, dilapidated beachtown in New Jersey, is experiencing something of revival after decades of false starts, as population and commercial and housing developments grow; change is largely attributable to demographic trends and increased desire on part of younger generation to live in more urban environments.
lead_paragraph: There are still pockets of abandonment in this New Jersey seaside town, but there is a palpable sense among elected officials, entrepreneurs and many residents that Asbury’s moment has arrived.

headline.main: Asbury Park, Long Neglected, Shows Signs of Rejuvenation
headline.print_headline: Long Neglected, ‘City of Ruins’ on the Jersey Shore Shows New Life

snippet: There are still pockets of abandonment in this New Jersey seaside town, but there is a palpable sense among elected officials, entrepreneurs and many residents that Asbury’s moment has arrived.
